Title: Relates to certain health care decisions for persons with developmental disabilities
Summary: Extends the provisions of the family health care decisions act in the public health law to health care decisions for patients with intellectual or developmental disabilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to and the public health law and the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to extending the family health care decisions act to health care decisions for patients with intellectual or developmental disabilities; and to repeal certain provisions of the surrogate's court procedure act relating thereto
